member.name: M:VRC.SDK3.Data.VRCJson.TryDeserializeFromJson(System.String,VRC.SDK3.Data.DataToken@)
member.summary: Creates a DataList or DataDictionary from JSON string input. If successful, this returns true and the result token will be either a DataDictionary or DataList. If not successful, this returns false and puts an error explaining what the issue was in the result token.
member.param: The JSON string to convert to json.
The DataToken to populate with the deserialized data. Will be an error data token type when there is a failure.
member.returns: True if the JSON was successfully deserialized, false otherwise.

member.name: M:VRC.SDK3.Data.VRCJson.TrySerializeToJson(VRC.SDK3.Data.DataToken,VRC.SDK3.Data.JsonExportType,VRC.SDK3.Data.DataToken@)
member.summary: Attempts to convert a DataDictionary or DataList into JSON string output. If successful, this returns true and the result token will be a string with the final Json. If not successful, this returns false and puts an error explaining what the issue was in the result token.
member.param: The DataToken to convert to JSON.
The format to export the JSON in.
The DataToken to populate with the serialized data. Will be an error data token type when there is a failure. Convert this to a string to get the final JSON.
member.returns: True if the JSON was successfully converted, false otherwise.
